channel.title: Devolution Enhanced
channel.description:
[b][u]Version two has been released, this server is now outdated.[/u][/b]
Well, although most of you don't know it, I've always had a soft spot for Devolution. I realize it isn't popular. I realize that almost noone will download this. I know that half of you will flame this topic into the ground.
But I really couldn't care less :)
I am releasing this for the few people who want it. I have only worked a few days on this, but already, it is several times better than the original devolution.
[b][u]UPDATE LOG[/u][/b] [code][11/23/11] * Downloaded Devolution v7 from RageZone * Updated Eclipse from the older version I had * Started working on fixing Errors/Warnings
[11/24/11] * Successfully fixed every Error/Warning showing in Eclipse * Began packaging the Server * Finished packaging the server * Organized the Config folder (Now data)
[11/25 - 11/27] * Grounded >.<
[11/27/11] * Added a skills package and a couple skill bases * Removed Devolution's Firemaking, in favor of a simpler base * Removed Devolutions Premium handlers * Added a Constants class, for future quick editing of the server * Added Admin and mod String[] 's, loading on login * Applied every dupe patch released (Special thanks to shoopdawhoop) * Formatted every file, and removed all of the unnecessary notes (except Client.java, just too many for now) * Began work on an NPCAnimation file, not finished yet (Thanks killamess) * Finished NPCAnimations! No file though, went through NPCHandler[/code]
[b][u]MEDIA[/u][/b] [img]http://img104.imageshack.us/img104/4251/10zn1.png[/img]
Note - The Download is like 13.2MB because I included a blank 317 client with cache. Set to localHost.
[b][u]Downloads[/u][/b] [url=http://uppit.com/vew8i6jc35w1/Devolution_Enhanced.zip]Uppit[/url]
Will add more later, would appreciate mirrors.
This is only the first version, I fully expect to release more in the near future.
Flame away.

item.title: Devolution Enhanced
item.dc:creator: @Nicholas2 Nicholas_
item.description:
@Nicholas2 wrote:

All right. I suppose I was a bit harsh, sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Enhanced
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

I really don’t understand. I’m not being mean to you, sincerely I’m not. My comments were neutral. I said that Devolution was part of the good old days, this was a compliment to your topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Enhanced
item.dc:creator: @Nicholas2 Nicholas_
item.description:
@Nicholas2 wrote:

You know, it’s great that you feel big by attempting to make people look stupid, but I would rather this topic weren’t bumped, so I’d appreciate it if you would take your sarcasm elsewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Enhanced
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

The Outsider:

Devolution was the first server I hosted, 5 years ago… good times. Although is that your picture? Silabsoft’s web client no longer works and Bakatool… well…[/quote][quote=“The Outsider, post:17, topic:423432”]I think you have to eat a piece of food first before attacking, if my brain reaches far back as 5 years ago… that is what I recall…

I think you have to eat a piece of food first before attacking, if my brain reaches far back as 5 years ago… that is what I recall…

No. And why would eating food have anything to do with attacking? I sat here and thought about it for a minute and theres no reason why you should have to eat food before attacking unless your coding is really bad… And I tried it just to see, it didn’t work.
[/quote]
There was a server a long time ago where you had to eat before you could attack. Obviously I didn’t do it. It’s called deadlock.[/quote]

The Outsider:

Just update the topic.

Flame?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Nicholas2 Nicholas_
item.description:

I think you have to eat a piece of food first before attacking, if my brain reaches far back as 5 years ago… that is what I recall…
[/quote]

No. And why would eating food have anything to do with attacking? I sat here and thought about it for a minute and theres no reason why you should have to eat food before attacking unless your coding is really bad… And I tried it just to see, it didn’t work.[/quote]
There was a server a long time ago where you had to eat before you could attack. Obviously I didn’t do it. It’s called deadlock.

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Enhanced
item.dc:creator: @Eternal_Knights Eternal Knights
item.description:
@Eternal_Knights wrote:

[quote=“Nicholas_, post:15, topic:423432”]Are you attacking a boss? Like the Black titan? If so, it’s cause it has so much Hp, it takes forever to show any red on its bar.

@Edit - Screw it, i’ll just upload a new version as V2 when I get home.
It has a bunch more shit, with NPC Anims fixed and everything :O[/quote]

Okay thanks so much man. I really like this for a server base. But no its not a boss, I was just attacking a normal rat, and it didn’t work so I tried it on other things like chickens and guards and it still didn’t do anything. But thanks man! Can’t wait for V2

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Enhanced
item.dc:creator: @Eternal_Knights Eternal Knights
item.description:
@Eternal_Knights wrote:

[quote=“Nicholas_, post:13, topic:423432”]The picture I used is a picture from the RageZone thread, as I just C&P’d it from my R-S thread, and I couldn’t be FKed to take my own pics.

I’ve just finished downloading and setting up the source. I fixed a few more things but theres just one problem, I can’t attack NPCs? Kinda odd. Can you help?

I downloaded the source after I posted the link to make sure it worked, and I could attack them fine.

In the version I posted, NPC animations are still a bit messed up though, but it’s a simpe fix. Perhaps you’re attacking it, and it just doesnt seem to block/attack?[/quote]

No, like its life doesn’t even go down at all… And I even re-downloaded it to try it with no editing and it still wouldn’t let me attack… Any suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Enhanced
item.dc:creator: @Nicholas2 Nicholas_
item.description:
@Nicholas2 wrote:

The picture I used is a picture from the RageZone thread, as I just C&P’d it from my R-S thread, and I couldn’t be FKed to take my own pics.

Eternal Knights:

I’ve just finished downloading and setting up the source. I fixed a few more things but theres just one problem, I can’t attack NPCs? Kinda odd. Can you help?

I downloaded the source after I posted the link to make sure it worked, and I could attack them fine.

In the version I posted, NPC animations are still a bit messed up though, but it’s a simpe fix. Perhaps you’re attacking it, and it just doesnt seem to block/attack?

Read full topic
